name: Jumpy Deer
description:
Help the deer to reach the top of the mountain. Beat your friends high scores!

Run for your life, and avoid dangerous animals and bad hunters as long as possible. They outnumber you but you are smarter and faster!

* An addictive game for the whole family!
* Tap left or right to jump, swipe to jump back down;
* Avoid spike traps, bear traps, drowning, rocks crumbling,...
* Escape from wolves, eagles and hunters;
* Colorful and peaceful graphics

Available for free on iOS, Android and WinPhone
